HomePage.title: About me
HomePage.about: I am a developer new to frontend, but I have two years of experience as an RPA developer. I am passionate about new technologies and actively seeking new opportunities where I can apply my skills and continue learning. I am open to new challenges and excited to see what the future holds. Feel free to reach out if you'd like to discuss further or if I can assist you in any way!
